评论详情: Pretty but not for me

I love this top! I’m 5’6, 165 lbs and ordered this in medium. I love the fabric because it’s soft and stretchy and very easy to care for. I love how this top could be dressed up or dressed down. Super versatile. Good quality and good fit. I’ll be buying a couple other colors in this style.
My woman top, fits me perfectly.  Very comfortable. And it very flattering.
The colors and fabric are great very comfy fits well.

I bought what appeared to be a red with white patterned top. However, it was actually a dark orangy red with yellow pattern.  It's very ugly and not at all as appears in the picture.  Also,  if you have a tummy,  size up.
I was not a fan of this shirt. I didn't care for the pattern in person and the fit runs small.  The sleeves are cute but run tight.
Fits well, comfortable material love it
Looked teal but isn't. Just a dull blue.
I normally wear a large and ordered XXL and the fit was tight. Hugged all the wrong places. Material was nice. Returned.

Colors are not as vibrant as in the picture. The shirt is kind of thin and feels a bit cheaply made. As well, the print on the shirt doesn't look as sharp as it should. It looks a bit pixilated and blurred in some parts of the image. I got this as a gift for someone else for Christmas. If I saw this in person at the mall to buy as a gift, I would not consider it, but the online listing pictures makes it look better than it is in person.
Fits great, fits to size.  Nice material and soft. Good color.
Perfect sizing and even prettier on.

评论概述: Runs a bit big (if you go by size chart). Order your regular size.
评论详情: I was going to order my normal size (Large), but went by the size chart and ordered the XL because my numbers fell in the XL category. I wish I had just ordered the Large. The XL is too loose and looks larger than the stock photo. Other than that, I think the shirt looks cute for the price. I ordered the black floral. It has white underneath the ruffle, instead of the print, but that doesn’t bother me too much because the price is great. If this was a size Large, I would wear it. So, that is why I am giving it 4 stars.  -------- If my viewpoint changes after I have posted this review, I will edit and update it.
wearing with gray jeans. cozy and attractive , I especially like the length of the sleeves

评论概述: Beautiful Shirt for business or casual wear
评论详情: This shirt is just as described.  It is a beautiful color and fits perfectly.  Fabric is nice and is a great value for the price.
Material is nice. Thin, but not transparent. Length is perfect. XXL Fits great although my size is usually XL. So size up if you are XL. Washes well.

评论概述: Excellent Quality and an Excellent Price and Looks Beautiful
评论详情: This is a very pretty top that I ordered for my wife. She loves the green and how it highlights her green eyes. The material feels smooth on her skin, and she likes that the material can stretch some.  It fits her very well and lays nicely without bunching up and pulling awkwardly. The sewing is done nicely, and I couldn't see any place on the shirt where the sewing wasn't done correctly. The ruffles on the sleeves just adds a bit of flair to the shirt that we both like.  My wife is a banker for a national bank, and she tries to wear clothing that she can wear for work and wear out on a weekend. This top fits right into that category. She loves it and I love how it looks on her too. And you can't beat the price either!!
This top is so pretty. Very flattering alone or under a cardigan. Fit makes you look slender in the abdomen area. Feels nice on. Fits as expected.

评论概述: Nice shirt, the sleeves tend to curl up and show white from the underneath
评论详情: I think the shirt is cute and fits well. What I’m not a fan of is that the sleeve edges curl up. With a darker color shirt like the green print I purchased, it’s pretty noticeable, and a bit irritating. Overall, it is cute but I probably won’t buy another

This is so pretty and feminine.  It’s light and fits nicely. I am 5’5”, 185 lbs and got the xxl. It fits just right. Can wear with pants or skirts. I get tired of plain t shirts and this adds some charm.
The shirt was soft and light weight. It is comfortable.

评论概述: Overall, the fit was too big and unflattering
评论详情: Overall, the fit was too big and unflattering. The fabric wasn't great either.

The sleeves on this blouse really are the key feature. They have the modern bell-shaped sleeves and are the perfect length so they don't get in the way when I am using my hands. The fabric is a soft knit that is so easy to wear.

The short-sleeve shirt has arrived, and it looks great when worn. It doesn't pill or shrink, has excellent breathability, and feels cool to wear. The quality is excellent, the style is simple and elegant, and the colors are vibrant yet soft. The price is quite friendly and I really love it!

评论概述: I'd say 3.5 stars. Fit Snug & Rough-ish
评论详情: Though I looked at the Size Chart more than once and read the reviews and the concensus that this item runs large, I ended up with an item that's too snug. Chat indicated XL and though I usually wear 3XL to avoid my tops being snug around my problem area belly, I went with the chart and the reviews.  But it did not fit.  Also I don't find this blouse soft but a bit rough. I will have to return this item, it's just too small on me.  Not sure whether to exchange for a 3XL as I'm really not crazy about the fabric. I'm pondering...

评论概述: I wanted to like this shirt
评论详情: The fabric for this shirt is soft and comfortable. It has a stretch to it and has a silk like feel. I ordered based on the sizing chart which also matches the size that I usually wear. And though it does fit me a size larger may have looked better on me as it is a little snug around the mid section. It doesn't flow as nicely on me as it does on the model. So if your mid section is a little bigger, you may want to consider sizing up. The shirt is also made for someone with a longer torso than I have. It really is not that flattering on me. I really did want to like it.

This lovely top is lightweight and attractive to wear. I really like the BOHO pattern on the one I ordered. The only reason I took off a star is because the serged edge on the sleeve started to fray after just one wash on delicate cycle. Thankfully, I sew and it was an easy repair. Despite that, it is cute and flattering. I would order it again.

This would be great for the office or a casual event.  It's more of a summer blouse as it's cold where I am but I can't wait to wear it on a regular rotation.  It fits true to size and the material is nice.  The pattern is so pretty.  It appears well sewn.  I'm a happy camper.

评论概述: Stylish and Comfortable – Perfect for Work or Play!
评论详情: The Zeagoo Women’s Ruffle 3/4 Sleeve Top checks all the boxes for a chic yet comfortable wardrobe staple. Made from 95% polyester and 5% spandex, the fabric is lightweight, soft, and perfect for all-day wear, whether at the office or out for a casual day.  The ruffle 3/4 sleeves and V-neck design add a stylish touch, making this top stand out while still maintaining a classic, versatile look. With a variety of prints available, there’s a style to suit everyone. The loose-fitting tunic style is both flattering and comfortable, offering freedom of movement and an easy, breezy vibe.  This top is incredibly easy to pair—whether it’s with jeans for a casual outing, leggings for a relaxed vibe, or slacks and a jacket for the office. Its versatility means it’s suitable for virtually any occasion: work meetings, vacations, dates, or even a party.  Personally, I find this tunic beautiful and easy to wear. The soft fabric feels great on the skin, and it looks effortlessly put-together every time.  Verdict: If you’re looking for a top that transitions seamlessly from business casual to leisurewear while keeping you comfortable and stylish, this is a must-have addition to your wardrobe!

评论概述: Love this top! But size chart is different, must scroll down for correct one
评论详情: I normally have to get a larger sized top for my bust and they tend to give me no shape in the waist. But this shirt is perfect. Fits great at the top and comes in at the waist without being tight on the stomach. It's light and soft. The sleeves are flattering. The tag is a little stuff but it hits my pants and not my skin so that's not a big deal for me currently. I see myself buying other colors in this top. The size chart at the top is different from farther down on the page. The one at the top says button down shirts and says I am a medium. The size chart scrolling down the page has me at a large and it fits well so definitely scroll down the page and go by that size chart!

As someone who regularly buys clothing on Amazon, I decided to opt for a top this time instead of pajamas, yoga pants, or dresses. I was pleased with the choice.  The fit is not relaxed, but it isn't form fitting, either. It leans closer to that end, though.  The v neck is somewhat conservative, you won't have to cover the neckline when you bend over to avoid giving anyone nearby a free show.  There is elastic on the arms about 1 inch above the elbow, then the ruffle flares out from that. It's a generous amount that you don't really feel it during wear.  I got the sky blue floral, and the photograph accurately represented the color of the shirt i received.  My goal was to get something that's business casual work attire, and it definitely meets that criteria.  This is a solid shirt that I like enough to go back and buy more in other patterns.

PROS: What's not to like, nicely made, perfect flattering fit for size ordered, pattern carries over to the back as well, looks great, feels great, stylish and unique. CONS: You'll want more in different patterns...Would make a terrific gift

This Zeagoo blouse with the ruffled bell sleeve is very nice.  The material is super soft and has some stretch to it.  I ordered the dark grey  floral pattern and it is just as pretty as the advertising picture.  I found that it ran just a tad bit smaller than I expected but it still fits.  The V neck is just the right depth and doesn’t show off cleavage. What I like the most are the sleeves.  The length and ruffle give it a bit dressier feel and also looks very feminine.  It can be machine washed but the label recommends line drying. If it’s not line dried then you run the risk of the fabric pilling. I would order again but probably one size up because the material is a bit clingy and I’m just more comfortable in oversized clothes.

评论用户: Thou who shall not be named
评论详情: This is such a cute top, it’s perfect for the spring with the light flowery print. The material is nice and lightweight and the sleeves are super cute. This looks very nice paired with jeans.

评论概述: Great top for a great price!
评论详情: This top is very comfy, stretchy, and soft. Fits well and is big chest approved. I’m 5’6, 177lbs, wear a medium to large in tops, and ordered a medium. Fits well. I don’t usually wear white tops because they aren’t flattering on me with my large chest. Darker colors have always looked more slimming. But this top is very cute and I feel comfortable and confident in it even in the white. Hard to find a white top I can say that about. What I really like is that they offer it in a gajillion different prints and colors. And for that price, I might just order it in every color. Highly recommend!

I ordered this women's top in XXL for my size 16 mom, and it fits her nicely. The top is well made, and my mom finds it very comfortable to wear. It looks stylish and flattering on her. After washing it in cold water and drying it on low heat, it held up great with no issues. Overall, this is a great addition to her wardrobe, and we’re happy with the quality.

The print is quite lovely. The stretch is good, however, I got a large and it is definitely too big for me. Kind of hangs like a box and has no shape to it. It's unfortunate because I really was looking forward to the cute ruffle sleeves. I will be gifting this because it just won't work for me. The fabric is okay but it's really a cheaply made item and not worth the price.

I love the fabric on this shirt. It's soft with a bit of stretch, so although the size runs just a TINY bit small, it's not a big deal. The print is very pretty and the style is flattering.  What I DON'T love is the tag on the lower part of the left-side seam. It's very scratchy. You can cut it off, but it's nearly impossible to get the whole thing without either damaging the shirt or leaving a few scratchy pieces. I'm going to try cutting it as close to the seam as possible and then sewing a small piece of soft fabric over it.

Nice blouse that fits me well. I ordered this is an XL going off the sizing chart and wanting it a tiny bit looser rather than form fitting. I love the ruffled sleeves and v neckline. The sleeves go to my elbows and the neckline isn’t too low to show cleavage so I can wear this without a camisole underneath. It’s perfect though to showcase a necklace. The hem looks nice left untucked but is long enough to tuck if you want. The material is flowy, comfortable and this washed well on gentle cycle in cold. I dried on medium heat for a few minutes then hung to dry the rest of the way. This is a versatile top that can be worn casual or dressy and I’m very pleased with it. I wore it today with a black corduroy vest and that looked really nice so thumbs up on also being a good layering piece.

Very comfortable wearing this lightweight and breathable blouse. Stretchy material. Had some static build up after taking it out of the dryer, maybe it is due to the polyester material. The white floral print against the rose red color is very pretty. The 3/4 sleeves are the perfect length and cute with the ruffle. Looks very elegant and beautiful, goes well with any bottom.

I am 5'4" about 170 lbs and typically order tops in an XL.  I ordered this in an XL and it fits as expected.  Love the ruffle sleeve and the pattern on this one.  There is a Vneck but it's not low.  The hem is curved.  The only issue is that it would be nice if the ruffle on the sleeve were lined because you just see white when  you bend your arm and the inside of the fabric shows.  Overall, a nice top.
The "Blue Painting" pattern on this shirt is artistic and exquisite, truly beautiful. The material is light and soft and hangs very well. The fit in the recommended size is Perfect.

评论概述: very soft and comfy, good fit, flattering
评论详情: This size Large shirt was selected for a woman 5'8" all, 168 lb., 38B. The fit is very good. I like the length which hits right across my bottom, and I like the flares on the sleeves too. The fabric is very light weight and soft....a bit stretchy too. It has the feel of a very soft , smooth cotton. I don't see any significant issues with the quality, though there are a coupe of places (on the inside) where the material was not cut cleanly....not biggie. I like this blouse and recommend it.
Size XL too big for me
